com
Class Variant

java.lang.Object
  com.Variant

public class Variant
extends java.lang.Object

Field Summary
protected  Call.VariantMessage.VariantType type
          The variant type (one of the constant listed above).
protected  java.lang.Object value
          The variant value, as an object, being (depending on its type):
- VOID: a null pointer;
- BOOL: a Boolean object;
- INT: an Integer object;
- DOUBLE: a Double object;
- STRING: a String object;
- BOOL_MATRIX: an array of primitive booleans;
- INT_MATRIX: an array of primitive ints;
- DOUBLE_MATRIX: an array of primitive doubles;
- STRING_MATRIX: an array of String objects.

getType

public Call.VariantMessage.VariantType getType()
Returns the variant type.

Returns:
the variant type, as one of the constants listed above.

getValue

public java.lang.Object getValue()
Returns the variant value.

Returns:
the variant value, as an object, being (depending on its type):
- VOID: a null pointer;
- BOOL: a Boolean object;
- INT: an Integer object;
- DOUBLE: a Double object;
- STRING: a String object;
- BOOL_MATRIX: an array of primitive booleans;
- INT_MATRIX: an array of primitive ints;
- DOUBLE_MATRIX: an array of primitive doubles;
- STRING_MATRIX: an array of String objects.

toVariantMessage

public Call.VariantMessage toVariantMessage()
Converts the variant into a protobuf variant message (optimized for transfer).

Returns:
the protobuf variant message.

serialize

@Deprecated
public void serialize(java.io.DataOutputStream out)
               throws java.io.IOException
Deprecated. Prefer to use protocol buffer messages through #toFunctionMessage().

Serializes the variant in a data output stream.

Parameters:
out - the data output stream.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while writing the variant.

deserialize

@Deprecated
public static Variant deserialize(java.io.DataInputStream in)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  CowException
Deprecated. Prefer to use protocol buffer messages through #Variant(VariantMessage).

Deserializes the variant from a data input stream.

Parameters:
in - the data input stream.
Returns:
the variant.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while reading the stream.
CowException - if the variant read is not valid.
